title: Ep 347 | Jase's Sneaky Ruse to Get a Friend to Church Gets the Worst Response Possible
description:
Jase lies to a close friend to get him to church, and it does NOT go as planned. Al is deeply touched by his experience at a September 12 event in Pennsylvania. Jase explains why there are no rankings in heaven. Phil and Jase talk about why we need to be the salt and the light. And Jase's broken toe gets him thinking about pinky toes in the body of Christ — you think you don't need them, but when your little toe is broken, your whole body knows it.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
